javadoc:
Listener interface for objects that are notified when a change is made to a Field, or Fields
 were added or removed from a set of Fields.

methods.javadoc:
Notifies the listener when the set of indexes changes - either the number
 of indexes or the fundamental data types associated with thos indexes.
methods.name: indexSetChanged
methods.comment:
Notifies the listener when the set of indexes changes - either the number
 of indexes or the fundamental data types associated with thos indexes.

methods.name: dataChanged
methods.comment:
Notifies the listener the data in the models has changed within the given
 index range.

params.name: min
params.comment: the minimum index affected by the data change.

params.name: max
params.comment: the maximum index affected by the data change.

methods.javadoc:
Notifies the listener that the width of this field has changed.
@param width the new widht of the field.
methods.name: widthChanged
methods.comment: Notifies the listener that the width of this field has changed.

params.name: width
params.comment: the new widht of the field.

name: FieldListener
comment:
Listener interface for objects that are notified when a change is made to a Field, or Fields
 were added or removed from a set of Fields.
